biotools.summary: The Pedunculate oak (Quercus robur) root database (OakRootRNADB) consolidates information currently available on RNA-seq research conducted on both coding and non-coding RNA. The database contains the sequences of genes, transcripts, proteins, and microRNA obtained from the meristematic and elongation zones of both taproot and lateral roots of Q. robur.
